name: Onyeka Okongwu
comment: Okongwu (hamstring) is considered questionable for Wednesday's game versus the Thunder.

name: De'Andre Hunter
comment: Hunter (illness) is questionable for Wednesday's game against the Thunder, Lauren L. Williams of The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports.

name: Marcus Smart
comment: Smart (ankle) said he hopes to return in one-to-two weeks, Souichi Terada of The Springfield Republican reports.

name: Jaylen Brown
comment: Brown will miss Tuesday's game versus the Heat due to right adductor injury management.

name: Al Horford
comment: Horford has been ruled out for Tuesday's contest against the Heat due to low back stiffness, Jared Weiss of The Athletic reports.

name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Tuesday he plans to do his rehab in Boston so he can be around the team, Jay King of The Athletic reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Durant (knee) is on track with his recovery plan and will be re-evaluated again in two weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Gordon Hayward
comment: Hayward (hamstring) is out Tuesday against the Suns, Roderick Boone of The Charlotte Observer reports.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) is listed as doubtful for Tuesday vs. the Suns.

name: LaMelo Ball
comment: Ball (ankle/wrist) is questionable for Tuesday's game against the Suns.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre will undergo surgery on a torn ligament in his left hand and will be sidelined for 4-to-6 weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Goran Dragic
comment: Dragic (illness) has been ruled out for Tuesday's matchup against the Pacers, K.C. Johnson of NBC Sports Chicago reports.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Ball said Monday that he's still experiencing some discomfort in his surgically repaired left knee and acknowledged the possibility that he might not be able to play during the 2022-23 season, K.C. Johnson of NBC Sports Chicago reports.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Green underwent an arthroscopic debridement of his right knee Wednesday and will be re-evaluated in approximately two weeks.

name: Dylan Windler
comment: Head coach J.B. Bickerstaff said Monday that Windler (ankle) is making progress and expected to play at some point this season, but the forward remains out indefinitely, Evan Dammarell of FearTheSword.com reports.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber said Wednesday that he hopes to return from a torn right hamstring prior to the All-Star break, Tim MacMahon of ESPN.com reports.

name: Nikola Jokic
comment: Head coach Michael Malone suggested Tuesday that Jokic (hamstring) is "trending toward probable" for the evening's contest versus the Pelicans, Mike Singer of The Denver Post reports.

name: Bones Hyland
comment: Hyland (finger) is out for Friday's matchup against the Pelicans, Mike Singer of The Denver Post reports.

name: Michael Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (personal) is out Tuesday against the Pelicans, Mike Singer of The Denver Post reports.

name: Peyton Watson
comment: Watson (thigh) is questionable for Tuesday's game against the Pelicans.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) is listed as out for Tuesday's game against the Trail Blazers.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley underwent surgery to repair a fracture of the third and fourth metacarpals in his right hand Thursday and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip) is out Wednesday against the Grizzlies.

name: James Wiseman
comment: Wiseman (ankle) is probable for Wednesday's game against the Grizzlies.

name: Jabari Smith Jr.
comment: Smith (ankle) is questionable to play Wednesday against the Wizards, Jonathan Feigen of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot) will not play in Saturday's game against the Timberwolves and will be re-evaluated in one week, Jonathan Feigen of the Houston Chronicle reports.

name: Andrew Nembhard
comment: Nembhard (illness) won't play Tuesday against the Bulls, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.

name: Daniel Theis
comment: Pacers head coach Rick Carlisle said that Theis (knee) won't be available for Tuesday's game against the Bulls, but the veteran center is progressing well in practice and will be available "soon," Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.

name: Tyrese Haliburton
comment: Head coach Rick Carlisle said Haliburton (knee) participated in the non-contact parts of Monday's practice, Tony East of SI.com reports.

name: Luke Kennard
comment: Kennard (calf) is out for Tuesday's game against the Lakers, Tomer Azarly of ClutchPoints.com reports.

name: John Wall
comment: Clippers head coach Tyronn Lue said Sunday that Wall has been diagnosed with an abdominal strain and will be re-evaluated in two weeks, Law Murray of The Athletic reports.

name: Lonnie Walker IV
comment: Walker (knee) won't play Tuesday against the Clippers, Tomer Azarly of ClutchPoints.com reports.

name: LeBron James
comment: James is questionable for Tuesday's contest against the Clippers with left ankle soreness, Tomer Azarly of ClutchPoints.com reports.

name: Rui Hachimura
comment: Hachimura (not injury related) is listed out for Tuesday's game against the Clippers, Tomer Azarly of ClutchPoints.com reports.

name: Anthony Davis
comment: Lakers coach Darvin Ham told the media Sunday that Davis (foot) "looked phenomenal" during a full-contact scrimmage Saturday,  Mike Trudell of Spectrum SportsNet reports.

name: Austin Reaves
comment: Reaves (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in a week, Kyle Goon of The Orange County Register reports.

name: Danny Green
comment: Green (knee) started doing 5-on-5 work last week, Damichael Cole of The Memphis Commercial Appeal reports.

name: Jimmy Butler
comment: Butler suffered a lower back injury during pregame warmups and is out for Tuesday's game against the Celtics, Anthony Chiang of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Robinson will undergo finger surgery and be out for four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) will miss another four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven underwent successful surgery Tuesday to address an impingement, bone spur and stress reaction in his left ankle and is out indefinitely.

name: Serge Ibaka
comment: Ibaka (personal) and the Bucks mutually agreed Friday to begin pursuing trade opportunities, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Taurean Prince
comment: Prince (ankle) is out for Wednesday's game against the Pelicans.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Timberwolves head coach Chris Finch said Saturday that Towns (calf) has "no timetable" to return to game action, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Jordan McLaughlin
comment: Timberwolves head coach Chris Finch said Monday that he doesn't expect McLaughlin (calf) to return to game action anytime soon, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Naji Marshall
comment: Marshall (toe) has been ruled out of Tuesday's game against the Nuggets, Andrew Lopez of ESPN.com reports.

name: Brandon Ingram
comment: Ingram (toe) will not play Tuesday versus the Nuggets, Erin Summers of Bally Sports New Orleans reports.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: Evan Fournier
comment: Fournier will not suit up Tuesday versus the Cavaliers for personal reasons.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Robinson (thumb) underwent surgery Thursday to repair his broken right thumb and will be re-evaluated in three weeks.

name: Jeremiah Robinson-Earl
comment: Robinson-Earl (ankle) is out Sunday against the Nuggets.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Chuma Okeke
comment: Okeke (knee) will remain out for Monday's game against the Celtics, Khobi Price of the Orlando Sentinel reports.

name: Furkan Korkmaz
comment: Korkmaz has been ruled out for Wednesday's game against the Nets due to a shoulder injury.

name: Joel Embiid
comment: Embiid (foot) is questionable for Wednesday's matchup against the Nets.

name: Deandre Ayton
comment: Ayton (illness) has been upgraded from out to doubtful ahead of Tuesday's game versus the Hornets.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: Payne (foot) will be re-evaluated in one week, Gerald Bourguet of GoPHNX.com reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) has been ruled out for Tuesday's game against the Hornets, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: Crowder, who has been away from the Suns all season while the team explores avenues to trade him, has been working out daily in Atlanta in order to stay ready for his next opportunity to play, Chris Haynes of BleacherReport.com reports.

name: Devin Booker
comment: Booker (groin) is out for at least four weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: WInslow (ankle) is showing significant improvement but is expected to miss at least the next two weeks.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) was spotted Tuesday doing some walking on a treadmill, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: O.G. Anunoby
comment: Anunoby (ankle) is questionable for Wednesday's game against the Kings, but head coach Nick Nurse said Tuesday that the forward will be available, Josh Lewenberg of TSN.ca reports.

name: Dalano Banton
comment: Banton (hip) is questionable for Wednesday's matchup against the Kings, Blake Murphy of Sportsnet.ca reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Kelly Olynyk
comment: Olynyk (ankle) has begun on-court work but will likely miss another week, Andy Larsen of The Salt Lake Tribune reports.

name: Kristaps Porzingis
comment: The Wizards have optimism that Porzingis could be ready to return to the lineup within two weeks while he recovers from the left ankle sprain he suffered in Saturday's 138-118 win over the Magic, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.
